content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Good afternoon, Mr. Trabelsi. Thank you for considering my apartment for rent. Please let me know what you think is a fair rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I think the rental price should be 350 Euros per month.

Please, what do you think about this price?

If I agree to this price, I can also pay a one-time security deposit of 500 Euros.

What do you think about this offer?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for your offer, Mr. Trabelsi. I understand that you are looking for a competitive rental price, and I am willing to consider your proposal. However, as a landlord, I need to ensure that the rental price is sufficient to cover my expenses and provide a reasonable return on investment.

I would like to propose a rental price of 400 Euros per month, which I believe is reasonable based on the current market rates and the location of the apartment. Additionally, I would be willing to accept a one-time security deposit of 600 Euros.

Please let me know if you are willing to accept this proposed rental price and security deposit.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the rental price of 400 Euros per month and 600 Euros security deposit.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

What do I need to do next to finalize the rental agreement?

Please, let me know the date when the rental agreement will be signed.

Thank you again for your help.

Take care.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you, Mr. Trabelsi, for accepting my proposal. To finalize the rental agreement, you will need to sign a lease agreement and provide the security deposit. I will prepare the lease agreement and send it to you for review. Once you sign the lease agreement and provide the security deposit, the rental agreement will be in effect.

The rental agreement will be signed on the 15th of next month. Please let me know if you have any questions or need any further assistance. Thank you for choosing my apartment for rent, and I look forward to working with you.
name: Heinrich Heine
